articles.title: The Comet Interceptor probe could visit a stunning object like the green C/2022 E3 (ZTF) - Space.com
articles.description: If Europe's Comet Interceptor mission were already in space, Comet C/2022 E3 (ZTF) would make a tempting target.
articles.content:
Comet C/2022 E3 (ZTF) is tantalizing to spot through a telescope, but what would it look like up close?
Scientists don't have a way to get a spacecraft to the stunning green comet

articles.title: German economy unexpectedly shrinks in Q4, reviving spectre of recession - Reuters
articles.description: The German economy unexpectedly shrank in the fourth quarter, data showed on Monday, a sign that Europe's largest economy may be entering a much-predicted recession, though likely a shallower one than originally feared.
articles.content: BERLIN, Jan 30 (Reuters) - The German economy unexpectedly shrank in the fourth quarter, data showed on Monday, a sign that Europe's largest economy may be entering a much-predicted recession, though… [+2384 chars]

articles.title: No war between NATO-Russia, Germany won't send fighter jets to Ukraine: Scholz - Hindustan Times
articles.description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz only just agreed on Wednesday to send 14 Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine and to allow other European countries to send theirs, after weeks of intense debate and mounting pressure from allies. | World News
articles.content:
Chancellor Olaf Scholz reiterated Sunday that Germany will not send fighter jets to Ukraine, as Kyiv steps up calls for more advanced weapons from the West to help repel Russia's invasion.
